description:
An ultralight static rope that works for short raps or for extracting someone who went for a ride down a crevasse. Because it has limited stretch, it's an efficient tool in a haul system or to use as an ascent line, but it's not the one to use to arrest a fall or to provide a dynamic belay.

  • Ultralight and compact 6mm cord
  • Dyneema® and aramid-reinforced sheath offers great strength-to-weight ratio
  • Compatible with Petzl Tibloc and Micro Traxion ascenders
  • Rough-textured sheath improves friction when rappelling or arresting a crevasse fall
  • Cord elongation of less than 2% ensures efficiency during rescue
name: Petzl Rad Line 6.0mm Static Rope
